job_title: Food and Nutrition Worker in Waterloo, IA
cons: Pay could be better but ok

pros: i was left alone to do my job, somewhat
cons: manager micro manages even when she has no clue what we do
Management and changes are not communicated well

review_title: Our unit is awesome to work in, we all work as a team and help each other out!  Everyone in our unit loves what we do an
pros: The until I work on is great.  Everyone loves what we do and that shows in the care we provide to our patients.
cons: Our benefits for being a medical based employer are  very poor.  We can only see Covenant physicans, can only use Covenant pharmacy and that is not open on the weekends.  If you need care after 7 PM and need a prescription filled you have to go out of network, because ours is closed.

review_title: I enjoy working at Covenant, my co-workers are like family.
job_title: Certified Nurses Assistant in Waterloo, IA
pros: Covenant is involved in their community!  Gives you the opportunity to advance in your career.   In services to keep us up to date on new issues.  Keeps up on medical technology. Has some of the best medical staff in the state.
cons: Would like better benefits.  Benefits keep declining.

pros: able to use some of what i went to college for, very nice coworkers, benefit package
cons: long hours, lots of over time, don't feel of value to company
